name: Façade: Murder At The Masquerade
description:
A murder has occurred at the Maximillian Mansion! As the local detective, the player investigates the murder at the mansion in a point-and-click puzzle game. Players would investigate the mansion for clues and interrogate suspects to uncover the truth behind the mansion owner’s death.
